text: Week_10 Non-assessed The circuit below shows a resistor R1 = 4Ω connected to a parallel combination of a capacitor C = 8 µF and a second resistor R2 = 25Ω. The source has a 80 V peak amplitude and operates at 1000 Hz. (i) Express the impedance of the circuit as a complex number z = a + jb. Hence find (ii) the magnitude of the impedance, (iii) the magnitude of the current drawn from the source, (iv) the phase angle between the source voltage and the current, (v) the power delivered by the source. R1 R2v C i
